name: Riding & Jumping Derby Horse
description:
Riding & Jumping Derby Horse is horse racing game which brings you the Challenging and thrilling Horse racing mission with amazing 3D graphics, realistic and smooth game play, with full of thrilling missions, jumping tracks and jungle environment, easy to play for people of all ages including kids, boys. The controls of Riding & Jumping Derby Horse is very easy to use. Tilt you device to move horse left, right and press swipe to jump your horse. Riding & Jumping Derby Horse is also an endless running mode. In endless racing mode you have sit on your horseback for endless racing and use your riding skills to survive as long as you can.


Riding & Jumping Derby Horse: Features

Realistic horse sound and animation
Very easy and smooth control
Score and coins award to unlock various horses
Addictive music and gameplay
